articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Call of Duty season 4 begins next week with new maps and playlists
articles.description: Call of Duty: Vanguard multiplayer and Call of Duty: Warzone both kick off season 4 on Wednesday, June 22. Warzone gets a new map, Fortune’s Keep, while Vanguard brings back a Zombies mode from 2008.
articles.content: Vanguard and Warzone both get new maps and fan-favorite game types

articles.author: Toussaint Egan
articles.title: CG anime Trigun Stampede getting simulcast on Crunchyroll in 2023
articles.description: Toho announced this week that Trigun Stampede, a new 3D CG anime based on Yasuhiro Nightow’s space western manga, would premiere in 2023. The series, which will be simulcast on Crunchyroll, will be produced by studio Orange, known for such anime as Beastars a…
articles.content: Trigun, the sci-fi action series by manga author Yasuhiro Nightow, is getting a new anime. Japanese production company Toho announced today that an animated adaptation of the post-apocalyptic space w… [+1407 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Original Pokémon Snap coming to Nintendo Switch Online
articles.description: Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack subscribers will get the N64 Pokémon Snap next week with their subscription.

articles.author: Oli Welsh
articles.title: Game of Thrones’ Jon Snow set to feature in a sequel series
articles.description: HBO is in “early development” on a series focusing on the fan favorite character played by Kit Harrington. It’s set to be the first GoT spin-off to follow the events of the original series
articles.content: HBO is in early development on a Game of Thrones sequel series focused on the character Jon Snow, The Hollywood Reporter reports. Its a live-action series, and Kit Harrington is attached to reprise t… [+1539 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Capcom announces Dragon’s Dogma 2
articles.description: Dragon’s Dogma 2 is now confirmed. Capcom revealed the sequel during a 10-year anniversary stream, with Dragon’s Dogma game director Hideaki Itsuno returning for DD2.
articles.content: Capcom is officially making a sequel to Dragons Dogma, the beloved but modestly successful action role-playing game released in 2012. The sequel, Dragons Dogma 2, was confirmed by Capcom veteran and … [+1030 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Final Fantasy 7 Remake part 2, Rebirth, gets release date, first trailer
articles.description: The second part of Final Fantasy 7 Remake got its first trailer, showing us the beautiful world outside of Midgar, and a title: Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth. It’s coming to PS5 in 2023.
articles.content: Square Enix confirms remake of Final Fantasy 7 will be a trilogy

articles.author: Julia Lee
articles.title: Crisis Core: Final Fantasy 7 is getting a remake
articles.description: Crisis Core: Final Fantasy 7 is getting a remake, called Crisis Core: Final Fantasy 7 Reunion, slated for most consoles this winter.
articles.content: The real price of freedom was waiting this many years for a modern version of this game

articles.author: Julia Lee
articles.title: Final Fantasy 7 Ever Crisis release date announced
articles.description: As announced in the Final Fantasy 7 anniversary livestream, Ever Crisis, the mobile remake of the franchise, will get a closed beta later this year.
articles.content:
Final Fantasy 7 Ever Crisis will get a closed beta in 2022, as announced in Thursdays Final Fantasy 7 25th Anniversary stream.
The mobile game serves as a less graphically intensive remake of the FF… [+1246 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade PC Steam version announced
articles.description: Square Enix’s FF7 Remake on PC has been exclusive to the Epic Games Store, but a Steam version is coming June 17 — with Steam Deck support.
articles.content: Square Enixs updated remake of Final Fantasy 7 is coming to Steam on June 17, the publisher announced Thursday during a livestream celebrating the original games 25th anniversary. Final Fantasy 7 Rem… [+703 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Final Fantasy 7 25th anniversary stream: Watch Square Enix’s event here
articles.description: Square Enix’s Final Fantasy 7 25th Anniversary Celebration event streams live on June 16, and will likely offer updates on Final Fantasy 7 Remake and possibly a peek at Part 2 and a rumored Crisis Core remake.
articles.content: Square Enix will talk all things FF7
